headline: Is Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (AMD) the Worst-Performing Blue Chip Stock So Far in 2025?
summary: We recently published a list of 11 Worst-Performing Blue Chip Stocks So Far in 2025. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) stands against other worst-performing blue chip stocks so far in 2025. Blue chip stocks are under immense pressure amid the evolving trade tensions […]

headline: 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks That Could Make You a Millionaire
summary: Artificial intelligence, or AI, is undeniably a massive opportunity with room for multiple big winners.  Many of the most promising AI stocks have fallen out of favor recently thanks to economic uncertainty and AI spending concerns.  Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD), which is more commonly referred to simply as AMD, is often overlooked by investors because it holds a distant-second market share in the data center graphics processing units (GPU) space to chipmaking behemoth Nvidia, which has about 95% of the space.

headline: Nvidia’s Trump Worries Go Far Beyond China
summary: “AI-diffusion” rules could limit the U.S. chip company’s sales even to friendly countries—and give more opportunity to foreign rivals.
